<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/feedback/t7"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Record T+7 feedback for a board meeting decision.

Called 7 days after a decision to check if it's tracking well.

Args:
    body: T7FeedbackRequest with thread_id, on_track, and optional notes

Returns:
    Success status and updated record
